  • Changelog

    Extract Allhomes past sales data for a/multiple suburb(s) and year(s).

    get_past_sales_data.Rd

    Extract Allhomes past sales data for a/multiple suburb(s) and year(s).

    get_past_sales_data(suburb, year, quiet = FALSE)

    Arguments

    suburb

    A character vector denoting a/multiple suburbs. Format for every entry must be "suburb_name, state/territory_abbreviation", e.g. "Balmain, ACT".

    year

    An integer vector denoting the year(s).

    quiet

    If TRUE then messages are suppressed. Currently ignored.

    Value

    A tibble.

    Examples

    # \donttest{
get_past_sales_data(
    c("Balmain, NSW", "Acton, ACT", "Nowra, NSW"),
    2020L:2021L)
#> [2022-09-13 06:09:01] Looking up division ID for suburb='Balmain, NSW'...
